name: eko® yoga mat 6mm
description: The eko mat provides a naturally grippy surface. Eco-friendly and biodegradable, this non-Amazon harvested tree rubber yoga mat firmly supports your practice.

name: prolite® yoga mat 4.7mm
description: A mid-sized yoga mat that brings unmatched cushioning and comfort to your practice. The PROlite® will never wear out, guaranteed.

name: prolite® yoga mat 9.3mm
description: Bring the heat. Lose the towel. No matter how much you sweat, The Manduka GRP delivers supreme traction with no slip.

name: enlight™ rectangle bolster
description: With its space-saving rectangale shape, Manduka’s enlight™ Rectangular Bolster features 30% recycled fiber-fill to create a firm cushion that provides superior support and cushioning, and sustainable. The rectangular bolster has a removable cover with hidden a zipper and made from our plush, soft and absorbent eQua mico-fiber fabric.

name: enlight™ round bolster
description: The enlight™ Round Bolster is a lightweight, classic, round bolster featuring a resilient, long  lasting fiber-fill to create a firm cushion that provides superior support.To Wash: Remove outer microfiber cover from inner pillow. Machine wash on cold with like colors. Hang or tumble dry on low. Tumble dry on low recommended.

name: enlight™ lean bolster
description: he enlight lean bolster is a lightweight, classic, round bolster featuring a resilient, long lasting fiber-fill to create a firm cushion that provides superior support. Soft, plush, absorbent eQua micro-fiber fabric cover keeps you dry and comfortable. Hidden zipper construction for a smooth, seamless finish.

name: lean cork yoga block
description: The Manduka Lean Cork Block may be slimmer than its full-size counterpart, but it's equally supportive. The thinner width is comfortable to hold and easy to travel with, yet provides a solid, stable base for your practice.

name: recycled foam yoga block
description: Between 50% to 75% of each block is guaranteed to contain a mixture of postindustrial and post-consumer recycled EVA foam without compromising durability or performance.

name: unblok foam yoga block
description: Recycled Foam unBLOK, with its functional, sleek design, and high-quality eco-friendly materials, this revolutionary block will help you unBLOK your practice this year. Great investment.

name: mat cleanser
description: A vinegar-based cleaner designed to clean and restore your natural rubber mat.

name: mat cleanser
description: This all-purpose cleaner leaves your yoga mat smelling organically fresh

name: mat cleanser
description: Keep your mat feeling & smelling fresh with our Everyday Mat Cleanser.
